# MPMediaPredicateComparison.contains

**Case**

Matches when a media item’s value for a given property is contained in the value of the media property predicate.

## Declaration

```swift
case contains
```

## Constants

- **MPMediaPredicateComparison.equalTo**: Matches when a media item’s value for a given property is equal to the value in the media property predicate.

items.description: Matches when a media item’s value for a given property is equal to the value in the media property predicate.
